Class MoveableEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • MoveableEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class MoveableEntity
extends GameObject
    Gives movement to both player and enemy class. Version History - version 1.0, version 1.1 Filename: MoveableEntity.java
    Since:
    16-11-2019
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Chester Descallar, Ben Parker copyright: No Copyright Purpose
